def Load(widget): import clr clr.AddReference("Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes") from Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes.Contratos import CNApontamento from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import FieldDefinition registro = widget.Entity if registro == None: return if registro.Fields["CONTRATO"].Instance == None: return
contratoEmElaboracao = CNApontamento.ContratoEmElaboracao(registro.Fields["CONTRATO"].Handle.Value) widget.View.Commands["New"].Visible = not contratoEmElaboracao widget.View.Commands["Edit"].Visible = not contratoEmElaboracao widget.View.Commands["Delete"].Visible = not contratoEmElaboracao if (not contratoEmElaboracao): statusApontamento = int(registro.Fields["STATUS"].Value) statusCadastrado = 1 if (statusApontamento > statusCadastrado): widget.View.Commands["Edit"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["Delete"].Visible = False
